entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump In middle of your coronavirus press conference, you talked abt 2nd Amendment! 

Then, as if that weren't stupid enough, in the middle of your coronavirus press conference surrounded by medical professionals you talked abt your poll numbers! You're an utterly incompetent nitwit!
